verses.text: \w In|strong="H1980"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* trouble \w I|strong="H3068"\w* cried \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* heard \w me|strong="H1980"\w*.
O Lord, deliver \w my|strong="H3605"\w* soul \w from|strong="H3820"\w* wicked lips, \w and|strong="H3820"\w* \w a|strong="H3605"\w* deceitful tongue.

\w What|strong="H1870"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* given \w to|strong="H1980"\w* thee, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w what|strong="H1870"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* added \w to|strong="H1980"\w* thee, \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w a|strong="H3808"\w* deceitful tongue.
\w The|strong="H8104"\w* sharp arrows of \w the|strong="H8104"\w* mighty, \w with|strong="H3966"\w* coals that lay waste.

Woe \w is|strong="H1870"\w* \w me|strong="H8104"\w*, \w that|strong="H3559"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* sojourning \w is|strong="H1870"\w* prolonged! \w I|strong="H3559"\w* \w have|strong="H8104"\w* dwelt \w with|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* inhabitants \w of|strong="H1870"\w* cedar:
\w My|strong="H3605"\w* soul hath \w been|strong="H0954"\w* \w long|strong="H0413"\w* \w a|strong="H3808"\w* sojourner.

\w With|strong="H4941"\w* them that hate peace I \w was|strong="H3824"\w* peaceable: when I spoke \w to|strong="H3824"\w* them \w they|strong="H3824"\w* fought \w against|strong="H3824"\w* \w me|strong="H3925"\w* without \w cause|strong="H4941"\w*.
